Package com.retriage.retriage.services

package com.retriage.retriage.services

  • Class
    Description
    EventService
    Service interface defining the contract for managing Event entities.
    EventServiceImp
    Implementation of the EventService interface.
    EventTimerService
    Service interface defining the contract for managing event timing and broadcasting updates.
    EventTimerServiceImp
    Implementation of the EventTimerService interface.
    JwtAuthenticationFilter
    JwtAuthenticationFilter A custom Spring Security filter that intercepts incoming requests to: Extract a JWT from the Authorization header (Bearer token) or a "token" cookie. Validate the extracted JWT. If the JWT is valid, authenticate the user by setting the authenticated user in the Spring Security SecurityContext. Allow the request to proceed down the filter chain if authentication is successful or if no token is found. Send an unauthorized error response if the token is invalid or expired. This filter ensures that requests requiring authentication have a valid JWT.
    JwtUtil
    JwtUtil Utility class for generating, validating, and parsing JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
    PatientPoolTmpService
    Service interface defining the contract for managing PatientPoolTmp entities.
    PatientPoolTmpServiceImp
    Implementation of the PatientPoolTmpService interface.
    UserService
    Service interface defining the contract for managing User entities.
    UserServiceImp
